entry.title: $2195 // Fresh Apartment in Classic Neighborhood
entry.content: Newly renovated walk-up apartment in South Williamsburg. The living room provides plenty of space for lounging, exercise equipment, a study/work area, hobby nook, or your sprawling collections. The bedroom will fit a kingsize mattress with space for dressers and shelves. The finishes impart a no-frills, modern calmness and standard-size windows allow for natural light throughout the day. As a bonus you have a small stretch of rooftop ledge for some fresh air. Williamsburg is a locale of up-and-coming culture yet maintains a balance with an original Brooklyn neighborhood feel. Marcy Ave. station (J,M) is two blocks away, every option from gourmet to takeout is close by, major retailers are alongside specialty or boutique shops. Move in now, spread out and relax in your fresh, new home.
